heading: About Christy Sebastini
intro: Marketer and creative professional. Digital strategy, content, and campaigns—backed by experience in food & nutrition, B2B, and e‑commerce.

experience.title: Experience
experience.paragraph: Strategy, content, and digital marketing across brands and startups.
bullets: Strategy & marketing tools (ProteinesXTC, NewFoodData); LinkedIn, SEO, WordPress/Joomla
Email & newsletters (HubSpot, Splio); trade shows & webinars; CRM; Analytics (GA, GTM, Search Console)
LegalPlace (Salesforce), Wonderbox (briefing & content), Catnipster (SEO & ads), Mawzi
Content/collab: Transavia, Ubisoft. UI mockups: ViaMapp, Viessmann (Figma)

sectors.title: Sectors
sectors.paragraph: Food & nutrition, B2B, e‑commerce, travel, gaming, energy.
bullets: ProteinesXTC, NewFoodData · LegalPlace · Wonderbox (large co.) · Catnipster · Mawzi · Viessmann · Transavia · Ubisoft

positioning.title: Positioning
positioning.paragraph: Marketing as the bridge between users and business goals. SEO, campaigns, CRM, and analytics aligned with brand strategy.
